list.title: module:scarf
list.description: a JSON-RPC variant with support for streams.

list.title: module:scarf~Client
list.description: Implementation of a scarf client. Connects to a scarf {@link Server} and automatically transforms stream arguments into scarf:// links and vice-versa.

list.title: module:scarf~Client#connect
list.description: Passthrough function that calls the underlying {@link Client~AbstractClient}'s connect() method

list.title: module:scarf~Client#invoke
list.description: Constructs a scarf message from the given arguents and handles the response

list.title: module:scarf~Server
list.description: Implementation of a scarf server. Takes an API definition and routes JSON-RPC messages to their handlers, automatically transforming scarf:// links into streams.

list.title: module:scarf~Server#listen
list.description: Passthrough function that calls the underlying {@link Server~AbstractServer}'s listen() method
